component.name: Outline Manager
component.summary: Set up your Outline Servers on the cloud and manage who has access to the server

description.p: Outline Manager makes it easy to create your own VPN server. Set up your own server and share access keys directly from the desktop application.
The Outline Manager application helps VPN server managers:

ul.li: Set up an Outline server on a cloud provider
Manage access to it with access keys
See anonymous usage data to balance the load across your servers

description.p: Outline Manager application helps you install Outline’s software on a cloud server and then manage a VPN user's access to it. Even though it is an administration tool, you do not need technical skills to use it effectively.
